synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaked three times in 1 l aliquots of fresh DMF for 24 h at 120 °C, followed by solvent exchange with THF via Soxhlet extraction for 3 days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: heating at 120 °C under dynamic vacuum for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: The powder X-ray diffraction pattern and Langmuir surface area (2,700 m2/g; N2, 77 K) of the material were found to be consistent with those reported in the literature.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaked three times in 3 ml of fresh DME at room temperature (~32 °C) for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: solvent was removed under reduced pressure at 80 °C
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Stoichiometric reactions were performed on microcrystalline powder samples of 1 in the presence of single crystals that were later characterized by crystallography.
